snippet: Working for Gov. Rick Perry of Texas can be quite a career boost, with former advisers now heading university systems and state commissions and serving on the Supreme Court.
lead_paragraph: Working for Gov. Rick Perry of Texas can be quite a career boost, with former advisers now heading university systems and state commissions and serving on the Supreme Court.

headline.seo: Perry Helps Former Advisers Take a Big Next Step
headline.main: Perry Helps Advisers Take a Big Next Step
headline.print_headline: Perry Helps Advisers Take a Big Next Step
